subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: For the first time in the N.C.A.A. tournament, Louisville found itself tested as Wichita State dictated the pace of the game.  The Cardinals’ first lead of the game, 56-55, came with 6 minutes 31 seconds left.
snippet: For the first time in the N.C.A.A. tournament, Louisville found itself tested as Wichita State dictated the pace of the game.  The Cardinals’ first lead of the game, 56-55, came with 6 minutes 31 seconds left.
